scripts.network: hc s clean && pnpm run build:happ && BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) UI_PORT=8888 concurrently -k "pnpm -F ui start" "pnpm run launch" "holochain-playground" "pnpm local-services"
scripts.launch: echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/living-power.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:$BOOTSTRAP_PORT webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:$SIGNAL_PORT
scripts.test: pnpm run build:happ && nix flake check -L && pnpm -F tests test
scripts.package: nix build -L .#living-power.meta.release -o workdir/living-power.happ && pnpm -F ui package && hc web-app pack workdir
